name: GH2 Corona Gorda
additionalNotes:
Gran Habano GH2 cigars are full-bodied factory closeouts, which means if you want robust Honduran flavor at deep discount, you're in luck. Presented in bundles of 25, all of the cigars sport lush Habano wrappers that surround a savory core of diverse longfiller tobaccos. The smoke is exceptionally creamy with dark, earthy flavors and a spicy finish. As you would expect from Gran Habano, the quality is top-shelf, which makes this selection an even greater value. Get 'em while they last!

A bundle cigar sold exclusively by Famous Smokeshop.
